p: In-silico study revealed that betulinic acid and glycyrrhetinic acid (triterpene derivatives) showed good binding energies against the protease SARS-CoV-2. In detail, these compounds could recognize the Mpro structure pocket forming an hydrogen bonds with Lys137 and hydrophobic contacts with Tyr237, Tyr239, Leu272, Leu286, and Leu287 [ 123].
